CustomField.inlineHelpText: How does your dog respond when you leave them at home (or when you prepare to leave)?
CustomField.label: Preparing to Leave

value.fullName: Follows me around with mild concern
value.label: Follows me around with mild concern

value.fullName: Moderate concern when I leave but appears relaxed when I return
value.label: Moderate concern when I leave but appears relaxed when I return

value.fullName: Panics or shows or severe distress and is highly distressed on return
value.label: Panics or shows or severe distress and is highly distressed on return
